mapper.select: SELECT concat('JOIN_CACHE:country_', #{innerOrgId}, '_', country_code) AS cache_key, country_code, name_cn, name_en FROM country where country_code in(#{codes})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:airCarrier_', #{innerOrgId}, '_', carrier_code) as cache_key, carrier_code, name_cn, name_en from air_carrier where id in(#{keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:airPort_' , #{innerOrgId}, '_', port_code) as cache_key, port_code, name_cn, name_en, home_country from air_port where port_code in(#{codes})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:seaPort_', #{innerOrgId}, '_', port_code) as cache_key, port_code, name_cn, name_en, home_country from sea_port where id in(#{keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:seaCarrier_', #{innerOrgId}, '_', carrier_code) as cache_key, carrier_code, name_cn, name_en from sea_carrier where id in(#{keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:commodity_unit', #{innerOrgId}, '_', unit_code) as cache_key, unit_code, unit_name from commodity_unit where id in(#{keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:special_commodity', #{innerOrgId}, '_', code) as cache_key, id, special_commodity_name from special_commodity where id in(#{keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:surcharge', #{innerOrgId}, '_', code) as cache_key, id, charge_name, computing_formula, currency from surcharge where id in(#{keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:weight_way', #{innerOrgId}, '_', code) as cache_key, id, weight_way_name, computing_formula from weight_way where id in(#{keys})
